Commander? I am so very happy to see you. Its been a long time.

I've been so terribly frightened since the alien destroyed our ship. I've been through literal blood and gore to get here. I was working on creating a Protectorate, a salve capable of invincibiliy. Had I been able to complete it, I'd plan on going back to the Primordial Guide to try and ascertain the location of Overworld.

But now that you are here, I don't need to. But, Commander, I've lost my datacom. I was digging up the gems found in the ore-stones here and I must have dropped it. Maybe if you dig up some gems while carrying your e-scanner, you might be able to locate it.
